DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy Finalgon® cream ( 1.08 % Nicoboxil/ 0.17 % Nonivamide ) versus placebo patient acute low back pain . To investigate safety tolerability repeat use Finalgon® cream ( 1.08 % Nicoboxil/ 0.17 % Nonivamide ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Finalgon® Cream Multiple Doses Acute Low Back Pain
